snippet: The case, in which a couple face accusations that they starved their 8-year-old daughter to death to sell her organs or conduct experiments, will not be heard until February.

byline.original: By SHABINA S. KHATRI and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: Shabina S. Khatri reported from Doha, and Alan Cowell from London.

lead_paragraph: The case, in which a couple face accusations that they starved their 8-year-old daughter to death to sell her organs or conduct experiments, will not be heard until February.

headline.main: Qatar Judge Postpones Case Against U.S. Couple
headline.print_headline: Qatar Judge Postpones Case Against U.S. Couple
